Post.title: sass
Post.content:
1/26/2019 10:54:49 AM

sass

CSS

CSSCSS

  • SASS$

      $blue : #1875e7;

  div {
  color : $blue;
  }

    #{}

      $side : left;
  .rounded {
  border-#{$side}-radius: 5px;
  }

  • SASS

      body {
  margin: (14px/2);
  top: 50px + 100px;
  right: $var * 10%;
  }

  • SASSCSS

      div h1 {
  color : red;
  }


      div {
  hi {
  color:red;
  }
  }

SASSclass1

    .class1 {
    border: 1px solid #ddd;
    }

class2class1@extend

    .class2 {
    @extend .class1;
    font-size:120%;
    }

  • Mixin

    MixinCmacro

    @mixin

      @mixin left {
  float: left;
  margin-left: 10px;
  }

    @includemixin

      div {
  @include left;
  }

    mixin

      @mixin left($value: 10px) {
  float: left;
  margin-right: $value;
  }


      div {
  @include left(20px);
  }

    mixin

      @mixin rounded($vert, $horz, $radius: 10px) {
  border-#{$vert}-#{$horz}-radius: $radius;
  -moz-border-radius-#{$vert}#{$horz}: $radius;
  -webkit-border-#{$vert}-#{$horz}-radius: $radius;
  }


          .navbar li { @include rounded(top, left); }

      .footer { @include rounded(top, left, 5px); }

  • @import

      @import "path/filename.scss";

    .csscssimport

      @import "foo.css";


### 1. 

#### @if

    p {
    @if 1 + 1 == 2 { border: 1px solid; }
    @if 5 < 3 { border: 2px dotted; }
    }

#### @else

    @if lightness($color) > 30% {
    background-color: #000;
    } @else {
    background-color: #fff;
    }

### 2. 

#### SASSfor

    @for $i from 1 to 10 {
    .border-#{$i} {
    border: #{$i}px solid blue;
    }
    }

#### while

    $i: 6;

    @while $i > 0 {
    .item-#{$i} { width: 2em * $i; }
    $i: $i - 2;
    }

#### eachfor

    @each $member in a, b, c, d {
    .#{$member} {
    background-image: url("/image/#{$member}.jpg");
    }
    }

### 3. 

#### SASS

    @function double($n) {
    @return $n * 2;
    }

    #sidebar {
    width: double(5px);
    }

# px2rem

## vue-clipx2rem

###  px px  rem  px  rem  px2rem  webpack  loaderpx2rem-loader

##  px2rem-loader

### 

	npm i px2rem-loader --save-dev

##  px2rem-loader

1/25/2019 4:36:17 PM 
###  vue-cli  webpack vue-loader  options  loader  build/utils.js 

###  cssLoader  px2remLoader px2rem-loader  remUnit  1rem= lib-flexible  px2remLoader  options.remUnit  1/10 750px

	// utils.js
	var cssLoader = {
	loader: 'css-loader',
	    options: {
	    sourceMap: options.sourceMap
	  }
	}
	var px2remLoader = {
	loader: 'px2rem-loader',
	    options: {
	    remUnit: 75
	  }
	}

##  loaders 

	// utils.js
	function generateLoaders(loader, loaderOptions) {
	    var loaders = [cssLoader, px2remLoader]
	}

## []

	const size = 200
	const screen = 375
	const flexFn = () => {
	    const windowWidth = window.outerWidth
	    const ratio = windowWidth / screen
	    const newSize = ratio * (size / 2)
	
	    document.querySelector('html').style.fontSize = newSize + "px"
	}
	
	flexFn()
	
	window.addEventListener("resize", () => {
	    flexFn()
	},false)

jsmain.js

const size = 200
const screen = 375
const flexFn = () => {
    const windowWidth = window.outerWidth
    const ratio = windowWidth / screen
    const newSize = ratio * (size / 2)

    document.querySelector('html').style.fontSize = newSize + "px"
}

flexFn()

window.addEventListener("resize", () => {
    flexFn()
},false)

# Vue transfrom

## vuetransfrom

### transfrom

>  enter

>  leave

###  vtransfromname
- v-enter v-enter-active v-enter-to
- v-leave v-leave-active v-leave-to

> ### css

### 

1. 
2. v-showv-ifcomponent
3. router-view 

### transfrom class

- enter-active-class="animated slideInDown"
- leave-active-class="animated bounceOutDown"

### 

	<transition
	v-on:before-enter="berforeEnter"			//
	v-on:enter="enter"							//jsdom
	v-on:after-enter="afterEnter"				//enterdone
	v-on:enter-cancelled="enterCancelled"		
	v-on:before-leave="beforeLeave"
	v-on:leave="leave"
	v-on:after-leave="afterLeave"
	v-on:leave-cancelled="leaveCancelled"	
	>
	<!--...-->
	</transition>

Vue

Vue.jsv-bindJavaScript|

<!--  -->
{{ message | capitalize }}

<!--  `v-bind`  -->
<div v-bind:id="rawId | formatId"></div>


filters: {
      phones (num) {
        let phoneStr = num.toString()
        let res = /(\d{1,})(\d{4})/
        while (reg.test(phoneStr.replace)) {
            phoneStr = phoneStr.replace(reg, '$1-$2')
        }
        return phoneStr
    }
}


//

{{17603446842 | phones}}

//

176-0344-6842


Vue.filter("phones",function(num){
      let phoneStr = num.toString()
    let res = /(\d{1,})(\d{4})/
    while (reg.test(phoneStr.replace)) {
        phoneStr = phoneStr.replace(reg, '$1-$2')
    }
    return phoneStr
})


var app5 = new Vue({
    el: '#app5',
    data: {
        shoppingList: [
            "Milk", "Donuts", "Cookies", "Chocolate", "Peanut Butter", "Pepto Bismol", "Pepto Bismol (Chocolate flavor)", "Pepto Bismol (Cookie flavor)"
        ],
        key: ""
    },
    computed: {
        filterShoppingList: function () {
            // `this` points to the vm instance
            var key = this.key;
            var shoppingList = this.shoppingList;
            //filterfilterfilteritemfilteritem
            return shoppingList.filter(function (item) {
                return item.toLowerCase().indexOf(key.toLowerCase()) != -1
            });;
        }
    }
})

template

    <ul>
        Filter Key
        <input type="text" v-model="key">   
           <li v-for="item in filterShoppingList">
           {{ item }}
           </li>
       </ul>

Post.content:
Vue slot-scope

1/26/2019 2:58:04 PM

VueVUE

slot

  • HTML

3

    • VUE




    <div class="slot-righ">
                <p>22222</p>
                <Slo>
                    <div class="con">
                        111111
                    </div>
                </Slo>
            </div>


    <div class="sol">
        <p>11111</p>
        <slot></slot>
      </div>
    • CSS

<div class="slot-righ">
            <p>22222</p>
            <Slo>
                <div class="con" slot="up">
                    111111
                </div>
            </Slo>
        </div>


<div class="sol">
    <p>11111</p>
    <slot name="up"></slot>//
  </div>

  • | 

<div class="slot-righ">
                <p>22222</p>
                <Slo>
                    <div class="con" slot-scope="user">//
                        {{user.data}}
                    </div>
                </Slo>
            </div>


<template>
  <div class="sol">
    <p>11111</p>
    <slot :data="data"></slot>//
  </div>
</template>
<script>
    export default {
      data(){
        return {
          data:11111111
        }
      }
    }
</script>

Post.title: Vuex
Post.content:
Vuex

Vuex

vuex vue.js vue.js state vuex

npmvuex

npm install vuex --save

state

srcstore(store.js) index.jsstore

store/index.js

import Vue from 'vue'
import Vuex from 'vuex'
Vue.use(Vuex)
let store = new Vuex.Store({
    state: {  //state
        name: "vuex"
    }
})

export default store

storemain.js

main.js

import Vue from 'vue'
import App from './App.vue'
import "./commcss/index.scss"
import store from './store/index'
new Vue({
  el: '#app',
  render: h => h(App),
  store // 
})

App.vue

<template>
      <div class="app">
        {{name}}
    </div>
</template>
<script>
import { mapState} from 'vuex'
/*
 *1.mapState 
 *
 * mapState 
 */
export default {
  computde: {
    ...mapState(['name'])
    }
}
</script>

Getter(store)

store/index.js

state: {
    count: 1,
    arr: [
      {
        sex: '',
        id: 1
      },
      {
        sex: '',
        id: 2
      },
      {
        sex: '',
        id: 3
      },
      {
        sex: '',
        id: 4
      },
      {
        sex: '',
        id: 5
      },
      {
        sex: '',
        id: 6
      },
      {
        sex: '',
        id: 7
      }
    ]
  },
getters: {
    man (state) {
      return state.arr.filter(item=>{return item.sex===''})
    }
  },

App.vue

<template>
      <div class="app">
        <ul>
            <li v-for="(item,index) in man" :key="item.id">{{item.sex}}</li>
        </ul>
    </div>
</template>
<script>
import { mapGetters } from 'vuex' //mapGetters  store  getter 
export default {
  computde: {
    ...mapGetters(['man'])
    }
}
</script>

mutation(state)

store/index.js

mutation: {
    change (state) {
        state.name = 'vue'
    }
}

App.vue

<template>
      <div class="app" @click="change">
        {{name}}
    </div>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  method: {
    change () {
        this.$store.commit('change')
    }
  }
}
</script>

mutation

()

debug app devtool mutation mutation devtools mutation mutation devtools

action

Action

Action mutation

  • Action mutation
  • Action

store/index.js

state: {
    count: 0
},
mutations: {
    addcount (state) {
      state.count++
    }
  },
actions: {
    getInfo (context) {
      setTimeout(()=>{
        context.commit('addcount')
      },2000)
    }
  }

App.vue

<template>
      <div class="app" @click="change">
        {{count}}
    </div>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  computed: {
    ...mapState(['count'])
  },
  method: {
    change () {
        this.$store.dispatch('getInfo')
    }
  }
}
</script>
mutation mutation Action action

Module

store

Vuex store module statemutationactiongetter

module/todo.js

module/todo.js

export default {
  namespaced: true,
  state: {
    count: 0
  },
  mutations: {
    addcount (state) {
      state.count++
    }
  },
}

store/index.js

import todo from "./modules/todo"

modules: {
    todo
  }

App.vue

<template>
      <div class="app" @click="change">
        {{count}}
    </div>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  computed: {
    ...mapState('todo',['count'])
  },
  method: {
    change () {
        this.$store.commit('todo/addcount')
    }
  }
}
</script>
